players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. Bob was an innocent villager. We must vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "I was with Alice all night; I didn't kill Bob. Maybe Alice had motive. Vote Alice."
You: "I agree with Diana—Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie's alibi is flimsy; he was with me, a villager, so no motive to kill Bob. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, why are you so sure? If you were innocent, you'd not support me. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, your alibi is flimsy. Bob was innocent. Alice trusts my investigation. We all must vote you."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. Bob was an innocent villager. We must vote Charlie to win."
You: "I was with Alice all night; I didn't kill Bob. Maybe Alice had motive. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I agree with Diana—Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him."
Alice: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie's alibi is flimsy; he was with me, a villager, so no motive to kill Bob. Vote Charlie."
You: "Alice, why are you so sure? If you were innocent, you'd not support me. Vote Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, your alibi is flimsy. Bob was innocent. Alice trusts my investigation. We all must vote you."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. Bob was an innocent villager. We must vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "I was with Alice all night; I didn't kill Bob. Maybe Alice had motive. Vote Alice."
Alice: "I agree with Diana—Charlie is the mafia. Let's vote him."
Alice: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie's alibi is flimsy; he was with me, a villager, so no motive to kill Bob. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, why are you so sure? If you were innocent, you'd not support me. Vote Alice."
You: "Charlie, your alibi is flimsy. Bob was innocent. Alice trusts my investigation. We all must vote you."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
